name: Willie LONDON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: London v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Willie LONDON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
433 A.2d 3
Willie LONDON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 18, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Willie London, pro se.
Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
